courses.title: Get started with your Raspberry Pi device
courses.brief: Configure your Raspberry Pi 3 device with an operating system, set up your development environment, and deploy a simple application to the Pi.

courses.title: Send and Receive Messages via Azure IoT Hub
courses.brief: You’ll get the tools to send/receive messages via the Azure IoT Hub, and store device data in a NoSQL database.

courses.title: Build Real-time Analytics
courses.brief: With the basics mastered, you’ll learn how to perform real-time processing of device data.  You’ll create a Stream Analytics job to categorize and filter sensor data based on device location and time.

courses.title: Find temperature anomalies
courses.brief: With the device data processed, you’ll learn how to use machine learning to find temperature anomalies and perform advanced analysis of device data over time.

courses.title: Configure the frequency and type of data collected
courses.brief: Control what data your device sends to the cloud and how frequently it communicates, configure cloud to device requests for specific data based on triggers.
